Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I take GenAI constructively, and use it to compare my work to the rubric to see if there anything I have missed. I do find by doing this GenAI is very literal

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I probably trust a teacher more than GenAI, and take it on board, however GenAI doesn't give feedback that can come across quite critical

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teachers give specific feedback with knowledge of the background, whereas GenAI is broad
